[[inst_sub]]
==== SUB

*Syntax:* sub SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Subtract source register or immediate from register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sub.svg[SUB encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
